name: resume-analyzer
description: AI-powered resume analyzer with modern UI/UX

scripts.install-all: npm install && cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install
scripts.deploy:build: npm run install-all && npm run build
scripts.deploy:render: npm run deploy:build && echo 'Ready for Render deployment'
scripts.deploy:railway: npm run deploy:build && echo 'Ready for Railway deployment'
scripts.deploy:vercel: npm run deploy:build && echo 'Ready for Vercel deployment'
